briefTitle: Placebo-Controlled Study to Investigate the Efficacy & Safety of Injectafer in the Treatment of RLS
officialTitle: A Double-Blinded, Multi-Center, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Injectafer (Ferric Carboxymaltose) in the Treatment of Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS)
summary: This will be a Phase III, double blinded, multi-center, randomized, placebo-controlled study. Eligible subjects will be randomized in a 1:1 ratio to receive Injectafer or Placebo on days 0 and 5. All treated subjects will be followed for efficacy and safety for 12 months. The subject's participation in the study will be for approximately 1 year from Day 0.

primaryOutcome.measure: International Restless Legs Syndrome (IRLS) Total Score Change From Baseline on Day 42
